## Bioinformatics, <i>Universitat Oberta de Catalunya</i>

<p style='font-size:15px;color:gray'><em style='color:black;'>*March 2021 - Present*</em><br>
Master's thesis student</p>

---

<p align='justify'>In the context of my master's thesis (*MSc in Bioinformatics & Biostatsistics*), and under the suprevision of [Dr. Izaskun Mallona](https://imallona.bitbucket.io/), I decided to unravel the *ignorome* of colon cancer (the [ignorome](https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0088889) consists in the genes that are important in the biological context of a tissue or disease, but that haven't been well studied or related to that context because of publication biases or fue to other reasons). </p>

---

<span style="text-decoration:underline">My contribution to this research was:</span>

<p align='justify'>
* Analysis of the colon adenocarcinoma-related ignorome.
</p>
